# Transaction Problems

Distributed transaction patterns.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| tx001 | Two-Phase Commit | 2PC coordinator |
| tx002 | Saga | Saga orchestrator |
| tx003 | Outbox | Transactional outbox |
| tx004 | TCC | Try-Confirm-Cancel |
| tx005 | Idempotent | Idempotent operations |
| tx006 | WAL | Write-ahead log |
| tx007 | Compensating | Compensating transactions |
| tx008 | Event Sourcing | Event store |
